title: [Cliffwalk, Narrow Ledge]
description: Barely as wide as a human's arm span, the mist-slicked ledge mocks any who try to move swiftly.  Loose pebbles of chert and quartz underfoot prevent a firm footing near the foreboding drop.  The pervasive scent of the sea lends a sharp tang to the winds whipping up from below.
